content: the premiere of the super mario bros movie is right around the corner and i wanted to make a free and easy pattern related to the game for everyone who like me is also a fan the character i chose this time was bob-omb as always i m a little late for the premiere but i think there s still time to do some bobs **note ** the sale of this pattern in whole or in part original or adapted is prohibited i ask that if you want to share it with someone or post the pictures of your bob-omb do not forget to credit my new craft amigurumis so in addition to sharing your own work you also share mine and help me keep doing what i love the most heart **materials used** * círculo yarns amigurumi in colors 8990 preto black 2137 hortênsia or light blue 8008 pedreira or light gray 1289 canário or yellow 8001 branco white * 2 mm crochet hook * silicone fiber or other filling of your choice * tapestry needle * craft glue this bob-omb is approximately 9 cm **note ** if you prefer to use another yarn do not forget to adapt the hook to a size that is more suitable ***happy crocheting ***
